articles.description: Tennessee leaps to No. 1 in our rankings of all 131 FBS teams after it beat Alabama. Georgia, Clemson, Michigan and Ohio State are next.
articles.content:
It doesn’t feel like an “anything can happen” season until Alabama loses.
There have been all kinds of upsets this season and surprise teams such as Kansas, Syracuse and Illinois. But Alabama is alw… [+482 chars]
